"I'm using YEAH! Sleep Timer. Get it while it's hot! \n\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yeahdev.yeahsleeptimerfree"
Please select a time when you want to wake up.
Please select a time when you want to go to bed.

Thanks for using my App. Here is a little How-to-use the App. According to scientific findings is a perfect sleep after 5-6 sleep cycles achieved. A sleep cycle lasts 1.5 hours. Further you go from a regular fall asleep time of 14 min. This time can be changed in the settings.

  1. At the first pick a time.
  2. Hit the 'SELECT YOUR TIME' Button.
  3. Look at the output. You can click at a card and set the time as an alarm.

Share my App, if you like it.

You can find the How-to under the settings.
Define the fall-asleep-time. Default time is 14 minutes.
Please tell me what I can do!
